title: sriraman ravikula sOman
sahitya:
shreeraaman ravikulasOman raNa

deeran shreeragu veeran avanE endau tuNai

(shreeraaman)



anupallavi



aaraavamuda namarar tuyar deerappuviyil dasarata ku-

maaran enavavadaritta vudaar saitan oru taaraviradan jaya

(shreeraaman)



caraNam



maadar kaNigalamenavaru seetaapati vanagamana vi-

nOdan munijanahrudaya mOda nidaanan

vaataatmaja mrudukaradruta paadan vanajavadanan saa-

kEta naagaraajanahrudaya saadagavabinava neeradasundaran

(shreeraaman)
